**Function**

- [sumAsync2( a, b )](#sumAsync2)

## Function

### <a id="sumAsync2" href="#sumAsync2">#</a> sumAsync2( a, b ) ⇒ `Promise<number>`

Returns the sum of a and b

##### Parameters

| Name | Type     |
| ---- | -------- |
| a    | `number` |
| b    | `number` |

##### Returns

`Promise<number>` – Promise object represents the sum of a and b
